title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: In the 1980s, there was a great movie starring Steve Martin and John Candy called Planes, Trains and Automobiles. Today, that movie would star AOC and Al Gore and be called NO Planes, NO Trains and NO automobiles: https://www.naturalnews.com/2023-01-13-no-trains-no-planes-no-automobiles-no-gas-de-civilization-democrat-utopia.html

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on January 15, 2023, 04:19:39 PMIn the 1980s, there was a great movie starring Steve Martin and John Candy called Planes, Trains and Automobiles. Today, that movie would star AOC and Al Gore and be called NO Planes, NO Trains and NO automobiles: https://www.naturalnews.com/2023-01-13-no-trains-no-planes-no-automobiles-no-gas-de-civilization-democrat-utopia.htmlIt was just a movie. Practically de-civilization is impossible unless or until the destruction of the earth (as in the film named 2012), where we would have to rebuild the whole civilization. Policies might be different, but it doesn't means we are being pushed towards de-civilization.

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Is  DE-CIVILIZATION even possible, I think is more of a fiction than a reality. The rate at which civilization and technological advancement is growing, one can only but wonder, if any thing can stop that. Today the world is talking about cryptocurrency and Blockchain technology ect, which has transformed the world with its potentials, so it's just not possible for us to make a U-turn and start an unthinkable DE-CIVILIZATION.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: De-civilization isn't the destruction of all of civilization. Rather, it is the destruction of the civilized way that people work together, freely, to build society structure that makes life easier for all.When people become compartmentalized - the  butchers, the bakers, the machinists, the doctors, the farmers, the crypto-enthusiasts, etc. - if somebody disrupts their system, they all have a more difficult time, and some even die. When they are in turmoil like that, it is much easier for somebody else who is strong, to fight them and conquer them.That's the idea behind de-civilization. The big de-civilization makers seem to have either decided that it isn't working, or they have decided that now is a good time to let it continue on its own.
